About Boredom Arcade

Welcome to Boredom Arcade, a gaming platform created by Zeeless.

Our mission is simple: to provide you with an engaging collection of games that help cure your boredom. We carefully select and host various games to create an entertaining experience for our users.

In addition to games, we offer web proxy services for enhanced accessibility. Please note that while we strive to provide a safe environment, users are responsible for their use of these services.

All games featured on this site remain the property of their respective owners. Boredom Arcade serves as a hub to host and promote these games, helping connect players with great content.

Created by Zeeless
